articles.author: Tom Tapp
articles.title: Dave Chappelle On Saudi Arabia: “It’s Easier To Talk Here Than It Is In America” - Deadline
articles.description: Chappelle and others have been criticized for taking part in the Riyadh Comedy Festival, given the kingdom's record on human rights and free speech.
articles.content:
“It’s easier to talk here than it is in America,” Dave Chappelle told an audience in Saudi Arabia on Saturday.
Chappelle was in the kingdom as part of the Riyadh Comedy Festival. His decision — and … [+1615 chars]
